attributes.action: Increase the purchase age of fireworks and restrict use to organised events.
attributes.additional_details: Allow fireworks to organised events or licensed people which can be obtained through the police.
attributes.background: There are far too many kids using fireworks in streets and parks, even posting them through letterboxes causing harm and damage to people and their lives. This needs to stop and fireworks need to be treated and sold like the dangerous explosive items they are.
